lines.text: Well, with the fire going on, all the ash and smoke, his aim-
I'm gonna stop you right there.
The fire only got bad enough to set off the alarm 25 minutes <c=#FF00FF>after</c> the gunshot.
If it was bad enough to affect his aim, it'd be settin' off the alarm.
What were you gonna say, anyway?
I was gonna say he missed so bad that he... hit himself, so...
Right, glad I stopped you right there.
